original_text: You may use strong soap to make yourselves clean. But I still see the dirt of your sins.’ That is what the Almighty Lord says. You may use strong soap to make yourselves clean. But I still see the dirt of your sins.’ That is what the Almighty Lord says. You may use strong soap to make yourselves clean. But I still see the dirt of your sins.’ That is what the Almighty Lord says. You may use strong soap to make yourselves clean. But I still see the dirt of your sins.’ That is what the Almighty Lord says. You may use strong soap to make yourselves clean.
korean_text: 주 여호와의 말씀이니라 네가 잿물로 스스로 씻으며 네가 많은 비누를 쓸지라도 네 죄악이 내 앞에 그대로 있으리니

sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 강한 비누를 사용할 수 있다
